description:
The team at Bragoli & Associates is completely committed to the pursuit of justice on behalf of our New York clients. Our goal in every case we take is to pursue the maximum amount of damages and compensation for those who have suffered as the result of another party's negligence. We have the expertise and the experience necessary to successfully navigate the civil justice system as witnessed by the hundreds of millions of dollars we have recovered for our clients during our time in practice.

Since we employ a team approach, we draw on the unique skills and legal knowledge of each of our attorneys in order to provide our clients with the highest level of service and legal counsel. Our extensive record of success and reputation as a leading personal injury and wrongful death law firm is based on our positive results from cases related to the following and more:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Construction
  • Truck accidents
  • Wrongful Death
  • Premises liability
  • Personal injury

At our law firm, we are passionate about protecting the rights of those who turn to us after an accident or suffering an injury through no fault of their own. With over a combined century of legal experience, we understand the complexities of dealing with insurance and pursuing the full and fair recovery our clients deserve.

Bragoli & Associates is proud to serve all five boroughs, and we offer free initial case evaluations along with virtual consultations if needed. Contact our law office today to schedule an appointment to discuss your potential personal injury or wrongful death claim.
